name: Clarify Document
summary: Learn about .CLARIFY files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Clarify documents can also be exported as .PDF files for sharing.
NOTE: Blue Mango Clarify was discontinued in February 2018.

description: Document created by Clarify, a program used for creating and annotating screen shots; saves captured images as well as text, shapes, and other visual annotations; used for making tutorials and illustrations and can be shared via email or Dropbox.
